description: Working with a live instrumental or choral ensemble, students learn and conduct complete movements and/or entire works and encounter a variety of advanced baton techniques. Course activities develop skills in reading, preparing, interpreting and memorizing scores, with further focus on rehearsal procedures, performance practice, and concert programming. Participants are required to observe a variety of rehearsals on- and off-campus. Offered annually in the fall semester. Prerequisites: MUSIC 251 and either MUSIC 252 or MUSIC 253.
name: Advanced Conducting
notes: Please note the recent time change.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: MUSIC 251 and either MUSIC 252 or MUSIC 253.
